channel.title: Permanently arrange desktop icons?
channel.description:
Every time i start whonix, the desktop icons are located on the left. although I had arranged it differently before.
ho can i the desktop icons permanently arrange?

item.title: Permanently arrange desktop icons?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Dunno.

A XFCE rather than Whonix specific question.

If nobody else knows this, I suggest to resolve this question thorugh https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle.

Read full topic
